contentrichtext.text: {{Bsr}} {{Non-free use rationale |Article= Argentine peso |Description= Banknote of 50 Argentine pesos |Source= http://www.camoar.gov.ar/index.htm |Portion= all |Low_resolution= yes |Purpose= to illustrate article on subject |Replaceability= any others would have same problem |other_information= }} {{Non-free use rationale |Article= Domingo Faustino Sarmiento |Description= Banknote of 50 Argentine pesos |Source= http://www.camoar.gov.ar/index.htm |Portion= all |Low_resolution= yes |Purpose= to illustrate the despiction of Sarmiento in modern currency |Replaceability= any others would have same problem |other_information= }} {{ir-Money}}{{Non-free currency|image has rationale=yes}} source: http://www.camoar.gov.ar/index.htm
